recipesJson.name: Raspberries with Custard
recipesJson.author: MCrane81
recipesJson.description:
Nice simple but effective one. 

The aim was to get nice fresh raspberries with custard as opposed to raspberry custard. 

I think it's been achieved nicely with this one and it works really well. 

Definitely a nice fresh all day vape. 

Feel free to S&V but it's really best after a couple of weeks.
